description: This veggie burger is satisfying, super nutritious and packed with flavor. Made with two different kinds of authentic Maille Dijon mustard, loaded with chickpeas, beets and quinoa. Topped with creamy avocado, and, of course, a little extra mustard for good measure ;)
name: Quinoa, Chickpea & Beet Burger (Vegan & GF)
recipeIngredient: 1 cup cooked quinoa (for instructions on how to cook quinoa, click here)
3 scallions, sliced thin (white and light green tops)
3 tbsp Maille Whole Grain Dijon Mustard
Maille Whole Grain Dijon Mustard to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400F. Wrap the the beet in tin foil and bake at 400F for one hour (or until tender). Set aside to cool
Peel beet and place in the food processor and pulse until pureed. Set aside. Repeat the process with the canned chickpeas

In a large bowl,combine pureed beet and chickpeas, cooked quinoa, almond meal, scallions, vinegar, Maille mustards. lemon juice, salt, cumin and black pepper. Mix until all the ingredients are well incorporated and refrigerate for 20 minutes
Preheat oven to 350F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper
Working with approximately 1/2 cup of mixture, form 6 round patties. Bake at 350F for 30 minutes
